h2. Desktop Buckets

Desktop buckets bring an innovative new way to deliver end user IT. Create a collaboration space where each user has a unified all in one cloud application portal to manage applications and data across all devices! Desktop Buckets uses a single sign on portal that lists the users' applications and connects them transparently to the selected apps. Users can use any device with a browser that supports html5. That is the case for all modern browsers and most smart devices like smartphones and tablets.

Start now and create your Desktop Bucket:
